info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.gia

post.summary: Allocate IP through Global IP Allocator
post.description: AllocateIP will allocate an ip address for the tenant read from context

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

delete.summary: Deallocate IP through Global IP Allocator
delete.description: DeallocateIP will de-allocate the specified ip address for tenant

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

giaAllocateIPRequest.description: This is the input message of the 'AllocateIP' RPC
giaAllocateIPRequest.title: AllocateIP Request

context.description:
This is the global ip allocator context from which ip allocation will happen
 Optional: If not specified, gia will try to allocate ip from default ip range

Example: ` "app-vip-pool-1"`
context.title: context

use_v6_range.description:
Optional: If not specified, v4 range for this tenant will be used

Example: ` false`
use_v6_range.title: use_v6_range

giaAllocateIPResponse.description: This is the output message of the 'AllocateIP' RPC
giaAllocateIPResponse.title: AllocateIP Response

error_message.description:
Error message from global ip allocator

Example: ` "GIA Internal Error"`
error_message.title: error_message

giaDeallocateIPRequest.description: This is the input message of the 'DeAllocateIP' RPC.
giaDeallocateIPRequest.title: DeAllocateIPRequest is used to deallocate an ip

context.description:
This is the global ip allocator context from which ip deallocation will happen
 Optional: If not specified, gia will try to deallocate given ip from default ip range

Example: ` "app-vip-pool-1"`
context.title: context

ip.description:
IP which needs to de-allocated

Example: ` "192.168.0.1"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.ip: true
ip.title: ip address

giaDeallocateIPResponse.description: This is the output message of the 'DeAllocateIP' RPC.
giaDeallocateIPResponse.title: DeallocateIP Response

message.description:
Message from global ip allocator

Example: ` "IP de-allocated successfully"`
message.title: message
